price: 82. Mpe ba oyo bandimaki mpe basalaki misala ya malamu, baye wana bakozala bato ya lola mpo na libela.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
